attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if fuel tax is not made lower people will not eventuall be able to aford fuel and will move abroad

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+fuel+tax&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=resign&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
